thread.title: Ivory Coast lets US company expore for oil in disputed area
thread.title_full: Ivory Coast lets US company expore for oil in disputed area | News24

author: news24.com
title: Ivory Coast lets US company expore for oil in disputed area
text:
Abidjan - Ivory Coast has concluded an agreement with the US oil company Anadarko to explore for oil in an area disputed with neighbouring Ghana.
The production sharing agreement for a deepwater block of 1 038km 2 foresees at least $30m invested in exploration that should get under way in December, according to a government statement received on Friday.
Anadarko has 90% of the block and Ivory Coast's national oil company Petroci the remaining 10%.
The block is in an area disputed with Ghana, a promising area where several oil companies including Total, Lukoil and Tullow Oil have reported significant finds.
